# functions.rsm.conversion_pred { #spotdesirability.functions.rsm.conversion_pred }

```python
functions.rsm.conversion_pred(x)
```

Predicts the percent conversion based on the input vector x.

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name   | Type                | Description                                  | Default    |
|--------|---------------------|----------------------------------------------|------------|
| x      | list or numpy array | A vector of three input values [x1, x2, x3]. | _required_ |

## Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

| Name   | Type             | Description                       |
|--------|------------------|-----------------------------------|
| float  | [float](`float`) | The predicted percent conversion. |

## Examples {.doc-section .doc-section-examples}

```python
>>> from spotdesirability.functions.rsm import conversion_pred
>>> x = [1.0, 2.0, 3.0]
>>> conversion = conversion_pred(x)
>>> print(conversion)
```
